price: Gara garee ol aanaa hin dhaggeeffachiifamanu. Gama hunda irraa (urjiin) darbataman.
arabic: لَّا يَسَّمَّعُونَ إِلَى ٱلۡمَلَإِ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰ وَيُقۡذَفُونَ مِن كُلِّ جَانِبٖ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: lā yassammaʿūna ilā al-mala-i al-aʿlā wayuq'dhafūna min kulli jānibin
